Feature.Text: Roll 2D6: On 2, becomes Killer for duration of encounter.
Never found alone. Will die in 1D6 days if isolated.
Can live on land for 1D6 days
Viciou. +1 Attack/Damage if wounded or attacking wounded opponents
Always attack if they wound their prey.
Mate for life in pairs. Never more than 2 adults encountered at one time.
Bizarre color and rancid smell. Cannot use stealth.
May slowly fly like a balloon
Extremely nutritious. 50% chance of a prediator in the area seeking to eat it.
Can regenerate in 1d6 days unless completely destroyed.
Nearly liquid. Extremely fast when hunting.
Number appearing is 3x normal unless in ocean.
Extremely unusual in appearance. Don't fit their own ecosystem.
Slow moving with heavy armor plating. 1/2 speed.
Unusual form of movement for its body shape.
If flying, add Pouncer behavior. Otherwise add Trapper behavior.
Do NOT triple the number encountered
If injured, has 50% chance of dividing into 2, each with 1/2 of the remaining End and 1/2 of the original damage.
Will die if new insect is End 3 or less.
Extremely fast metabolism. Regenerate 1 END per round.
Profuse body fair signaling innate adaptability.
If heavier than foe, reduce Attacks On by 4.
Attacks if it has surprise. Flees otherwise.
